meanings.definition: A decorative molding that runs along the top of a wall.
meanings.sent1: The cornicing in the room added a touch of elegance to the walls.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully painted the cornicing to match the color scheme of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the cornicing was a perfect spot to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the cornicing of a beautiful painting, framing her face perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window highlighted the intricate cornicing beautifully.

meanings.definition: The act of installing or adding cornice molding to a structure.
meanings.sent1: The cornicing of the new building was done by skilled craftsmen.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers completed the cornicing of the house before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be cornicing experts, using cardboard to create their own designs.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the careful cornicing of a speech, adding structure and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers echoed through the neighborhood as the cornicing work continued.
